snippet: High-level talks had been scheduled for Sunday and Monday, but both sides traded barbs over Pakistan’s plans to meet with Kashmiri separatist leaders.

byline.original: By SALMAN MASOOD and NIDA NAJAR
byline.contributor: Salman Masood reported from Islamabad, and Nida Najar from New Delhi. Hari Kumar contributed reporting from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: High-level talks had been scheduled for Sunday and Monday, but both sides traded barbs over Pakistan’s plans to meet with Kashmiri separatist leaders.

headline.main: Pakistan Cancels Talks With India, Citing Restrictions
